entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:16 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 09:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 10 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
